name: Magical Squash
description: 'Magical Squash' is a virtual reality sports game.The players will view a fantasy squash court immediately at home or even in the office.Within10 minutes, the player will get their body exercised and enjoy a healthy and fun experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64bit) or higher Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
